languages.text: "Я дам тебе шанс объяснить, почему ты зовешь себя чужим именем".
"I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."
languages.original_text: "Я дам тебе шанс объяснить, почему ты зовешь себя чужим именем".

traits.locale_text: "I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."
"I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."
"I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."
"I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."
"I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."
"I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."

languages.text: 「お前がなぜ他人の名前を使っているのか、説明する機会を与えてやろう」
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."

traits.locale_text: 「お前がなぜ他人の名前を使っているのか、説明する機会を与えてやろう」

languages.text: “我给你个机会，你可以解释一下为什么要盗用别人的名字。”
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."

traits.locale_text: “我给你个机会，你可以解释一下为什么要盗用别人的名字。”

languages.text: "Ich gebe Euch Gelegenheit, zu erklären, warum Ihr den Namen eines anderen benutzt."
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe Euch Gelegenheit, zu erklären, warum Ihr den Namen eines anderen benutzt."

languages.text: « Je vous laisse une chance de m'expliquer pourquoi vous utilisez le nom d'un autre. »
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous laisse une chance de m'expliquer pourquoi vous utilisez le nom d'un autre. »

languages.text: «Le daré una oportunidad para explicar por qué está usando un apellido ajeno».
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."

traits.locale_text: «Le daré una oportunidad para explicar por qué está usando un apellido ajeno».

languages.text: "Sana neden bir başkasının adını kullandığını açıklaman için fırsat sunuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to explain why you are using the name of another."

traits.locale_text: "Sana başka birinin ismini neden kullandığını açıklaman için bir şans veriyorum."
